results.name: Möbius transform of A244042.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: Table[DivisorSum[n, MoebiusMu[n/#] FromDigits[IntegerDigits[#, 3] /. 2 -> 0, 3] &], {n, 84}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 17 2018 *)
